column4: hi. Please, apparently I can't go to the domain 'grooveshark.com' (I don't know if other are blocked too)... I know It's working because I've just visit that site in my Windows partition
How can I see if a domain is blocked, because I can not navigate in Ubuntu but I just did in Windows
You can trace the packages from your computer to the end destination and see if it's blocked there or earlier
K530: yes, that I know. It's done
but I'm getting a GPG error v  :(
kubuntu? I've no idea..check your settings for add/remove programs
Anyone knows why there's no usleep with ubuntu/kubuntu?
Don't worry about that, please help me with the blocked domain problem please
same a sme. Check settings in add/remove programs
apparently I can't go to the domain 'grooveshark.com' (I don't know if other are blocked too)... I know It's working because I've just visit that site in my Windows partition
